Message.Text: Tommy, I just realized... this conference might not be as fun as last year. It feels different this time.
Yeah, I get what you mean, Frank. I was looking forward to it, but now it feels like something’s missing.
Maybe it’s because we’re sharing a room again, but I don’t know... I’m not as excited about it.
Same here. Last year, it felt like such a great time, but now I’m just not sure. Even the idea of grabbing beers doesn’t seem as exciting.
I was thinking the same. I thought the local brews would cheer me up, but it’s just not the same vibe.
Yeah... I don’t know if it’s the sessions or just the feeling of it all. It’s hard to look forward to it like before.
We’ll still go, but I guess we’ll just have to see how it goes. Hopefully, it’s not as dull as we’re expecting.
Yeah, maybe things will turn around when we’re there. But for now, I’m not too hopeful.
